citeinfo.origin: Wisconsin Department of Agriculture, Trade, and Consumer Protection
citeinfo.title: Nurseries, Wisconsin 2016

descript.abstract: This feature class includes the locations and general attributes of active nursery businesses - specifically active nursery fields - licensed by the Wisconsin Department of Agriculture, Trade and Consumer Protection (DATCP) as of 01/06/2016(i.e., date the list of licensed nursery businesses was last downloaded from the agency "AMANDA" licensing database). Only businesses that operate (e.g., headquarters, facility, plant) on a property in Wisconsin are included.Point locations were generated by Centrus Desktop address geocoding software or collected by field staff using recreational grade GPS. "Active" NU licenses may include licenses with the following status: pending, active, conditional, renewal, ready to issue, pending-renewal, pending-financial, and pending-premises.
descript.purpose: This feature class includes the locations and general attributes of active nursery businesses - specifically active nursery fields - licensed and inspected by the Wisconsin Department of Agriculture, Trade and Consumer Protection (DATCP). Only businesses that operate (e.g., headquarters, facility, plant) on a property in Wisconsin or keep records on a property in Wisconsin are included.
descript.supplinf: Augmented original metadata with UW-Madison specific elements. For online dataset download, please visit [ftp://ftp.datcp.state.wi.us/GIS/]. For more information on DATCP GIS data, please see: http://datcp.wi.gov/Newsroom/DATCP_Maps/GIS_Data/

idinfo.useconst: The contents of this feature class change regularly, Please refer requests for this feature class to Alison Mynsberge at Alison.Mynsberge@wi.gov or 608-224-4904 or Larry Cutforth at Laurence.Cutforth@wi.gov or 608-224-4819, so that requesters can receive the most current information.

attracc.attraccr: Attribute information remains the same as given by the author of the data.

procstep.procdesc: Changed name of file from 'DATCP_NURSERY’ to WI_Nurseries_2016

enttyp.enttypds: Wisconsin Department of Agriculture, Trade, and Consumer Protection

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Historical folder reference number for internal use.
Business legal name. This may differ from any "doing business as" names associated with the business.
4000 = Nursery Grower License 4001 = Nursery Dealer License 4002 = Christmas Tree Grower License
4000 = Nursery Grower License 4001 = Nursery Dealer License 4002 = Christmas Tree Grower License
Internal property number from DATCP AMANDA database.

Physical address of the property where the licensed business operates and is inspected, or where business records are kept and inspected. This address may differ from the mailing address or other addresses associated with the business.
City where the licensed business operates and is inspected, or where business records are kept and inspected. This city may differ from the mailing city or other cities associated with the business.

State where the licensed business operates and is inspected, or where business records are kept and inspected. This state may differ from the mailing state or other states associated with the business.
Postal code where the licensed business operates and is inspected. This address postal code may differ from the mailing address postal code or other address postal codes associated with the business.
DATCP Amanda database county code. 1- to 2-digit number representing county names in alphabetical order, except Menominee County is 72. This system is also commonly used by DOR and DOA.

Date the coordinates were processed - usually the date the feature class was created for ADDRESS geocoded coordinates. For GPS coordinates, the date the coordinates were collected or entered into the system.
Longitude in decimal degrees referenced to WGS84.
Latitude in decimal degrees referenced to WGS84.
License status description: 3 = Pending; 4 = Active; 5 = Conditional; 12 = Renewal; 13 = Ready to Issue; 14 = Pending Renewal; 31 = Pending Financial; 44 = Pending Premises
